dependencies.lint:changed: npm run lint:js:changed && npm run lint:sass
dependencies.lint:js:changed: LIST=`git diff-index --name-only HEAD | grep "\.js[x]\{0,1\}$"`; if [ "$LIST" ]; then eslint --quiet $LIST; fi
dependencies.lint:js:changed:fix: LIST=`git diff-index --name-only HEAD | grep "\.js[x]\{0,1\}$"`; if [ "$LIST" ]; then eslint --fix --quiet $LIST; fi
